cssJsMinify.title: Minify CSS/JS
cssJsMinify.description: Compress your CSS or JavaScript code by removing unnecessary spaces, line breaks, and comments.

toolInfo.title: Minify CSS/JS
toolInfo.description: This tool minifies your CSS or JavaScript code by removing unnecessary characters like whitespace, line breaks, and commentsâ€”without affecting functionality. Ideal for optimizing web performance and reducing file size before deployment.

cssJsUnminify.title: Unminify CSS/JS
cssJsUnminify.description: Beautify or unminify your compressed CSS or JavaScript code for better readability.

toolInfo.title: Unminify CSS/JS
toolInfo.description: This tool reformats your compressed CSS or JavaScript code by adding appropriate spacing and line breaks. Useful for debugging or inspecting minified code.
